main event: A probable satellite was observed going east at an unknown speed on December 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object was initially reported as a UFO, but later concluded to be a satellite, specifically Echo 1.
The sighting was made visually, with the object observed in the azimuth where Echo 1 would have been located.
The report includes a message from the Air Force indicating the object was likely a satellite, and providing the coordinates of the sighting.
The sighting lasted an unknown duration.
The report was from Project Blue Book, a historical government program that investigated UFO sightings.
sighted object: unknown, later concluded to be a satellite
photographs: yes, but not included in the report
